title: Melo language
text: Melo (also known as Malo) is an <a href="Afro-Asiatic%20languages">Afro-Asiatic</a> language spoken in the <a href="Gamo%20Gofa%20Zone">Gamo Gofa Zone</a> of the <a href="Southern%20Nations%2C%20Nationalities%2C%20and%20People%27s%20Region">Southern Nations, Nationalities, and People's Region</a> in <a href="Ethiopia">Ethiopia</a>.
